title: 2020 Pinatar Cup
text:
The 2020 Pinatar Cup was the inaugural edition of the <a href="Pinatar%20Cup">Pinatar Cup</a>, an international women's <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournament, consisting of a series of <a href="Exhibition%20game">friendly games</a>. It was held in <a href="San%20Pedro%20del%20Pinatar%2C%20Spain">San Pedro del Pinatar, Spain</a> from 4 to 10 March 2020, and featured four teams.
Scotland won the first edition of the tournament.
Format.
The four invited teams played a <a href="round-robin%20tournament">round-robin tournament</a>. Points awarded in the group stage followed the formula of three points for a win, one point for a draw, and zero points for a loss. A tie in points was decided by <a href="Goal%20difference">goal differential</a>.
Venues.
All the matches were played at the <a href="Pinatar%20Arena">Pinatar Arena</a> in San Pedro del Pinatar.
Matches.
"All times are local (<a href="Central%20European%20Time">UTC+1</a>)".
